section.name: Welcome to Charm
section.p: Charm is the next generation framework being developed by ApexIT

subsection.name: About Charm
subsection.p: Charm is Apex's 3rd generation framework for developing standards-based internet applications. Leveraging our experience with our iFrame and iFrame2 frameworks (currently the foundation for scores of applications used by hundreds of thousands of people everyday and managing billions of dollars in assets and transactions) we set out to design our new framework on a select set of open source technologies.

subsection.name: Design Goals
subsection.p: The goal of Charm is basically the same as the goal of all of Apex's past framework development: to make it faster and easier for us to create more robust and sophisticated applications for our clients. Specifically, the goal is to:

ul.li: Enhance our ability to support our clients by leveraging a common architecture
Reduce the time spent writing tedious code, freeing up time to solve unique business problems
